templates module¶

This module contains z3-encodings of the templates for the closed form of the MLP. The function optimize_template from logic.py tries to fit the parameters of a given templates to the input/output relation of the MLP.

class mlp_smt_closed.smt.templates.LinearTemplate¶

Bases: mlp_smt_closed.smt.templates.Template

Class representing the set of linear functions \(f\) with \(f: \in \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, f(x) = a \cdot x + b, a,b \in \mathbb{R}\)
